mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(T1.AD_IDX , '') AS AD_IDX , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_ID , '') AS ADMIN_ID , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_PASSWORD , '') AS ADMIN_PASSWORD , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_NAME , '') AS ADMIN_NAME , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_CONTACT1 , '') AS USER_CONTACT1 , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_CONTACT2 , '') AS USER_CONTACT2 , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_ROLE , '') AS USER_ROLE , IFNULL(T2.TEMPLATE_NM , '') AS ROLE , IFNULL(T1.RT_IDX , '') AS RT_IDX , IFNULL(T1.REG_DT , '') AS REG_DT , IFNULL(T1.REG_ID , '') AS REG_ID , IFNULL(T1.MOD_DT , '') AS MOD_DT , IFNULL(T1.MOD_ID , '') AS MOD_ID , IFNULL(T1.DEL_YN , '') AS DEL_YN FROM CDT_ADMIN_INFO T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CDT_MENU_TEMPLATE T2 ON T1.ADMIN_ROLE = T2.TEMPLATE_CD

SELECT IFNULL(T1.AD_IDX , '') AS AD_IDX , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_ID , '') AS ADMIN_ID , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_PASSWORD , '') AS ADMIN_PASSWORD , IFNULL(T1.ADMIN_NAME , '') AS ADMIN_NAME , IFNULL(T1.USER_CONTACT1 , '') AS USER_CONTACT1 , IFNULL(T1.USER_CONTACT2 , '') AS USER_CONTACT2 , IFNULL(T1.USER_ROLE , '') AS USER_ROLE , IFNULL(T2.TEMPLATE_NM , '') AS ROLE , IFNULL(T1.RT_IDX , '') AS RT_IDX , IFNULL(T1.REG_DT , '') AS REG_DT , IFNULL(T1.REG_ID , '') AS REG_ID , IFNULL(T1.MOD_DT , '') AS MOD_DT , IFNULL(T1.MOD_ID , '') AS MOD_ID , IFNULL(T1.DEL_YN , '') AS DEL_YN FROM CDT_ADMIN_INFO T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CDT_MENU_TEMPLATE T2 ON T1.USER_ROLE = T2.TEMPLATE_CD
AND T1.AD_IDX = #{adIdx}

SELECT IFNULL(TEMPLATE_CD , '') AS TEMPLATE_CD /*템플릿코드*/ , IFNULL(TEMPLATE_NM , '') AS TEMPLATE_NM /*템플릿명*/ , IFNULL(TEMPLATE_MEMO , '') AS TEMPLATE_MEMO /*템플릿설명*/ , IFNULL(REG_DT , '') AS REG_DT /*등록일*/ , IFNULL(REG_ID , '') AS REG_ID /*등록자*/ , IFNULL(MOD_DT , '') AS MOD_DT /*수정자*/ , IFNULL(MOD_ID , '') AS MOD_ID /*수정자*/ , IFNULL(ROLE , '') AS ROLE /**/ FROM CDT_MENU_TEMPLATE
